item.title: Add_SOAP_WSS_to_the_existing_SOAP_client_and_server_mock_code
item.description: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/Add-SOAP-WSS-the-existing-SOAP-client-and-server-mock-code_~021836005659145726510/?referrer_url_path=find_work_home I am looking for somebody with hands-on experience in SOAP WSS to help me troubleshoot (or reimplement) a mock SOAP WSS client and server. I already have a working python code which implements mock SOAP client and server side, without WSS: https://github.com/abbbe/soapwss/tree/main/nowss/ I am trying to add WSS to this code. The client side seems to work (at least signature validation), but I have issues implementing servers side. Here is the code which features server-side WSS validation, but it fails https://github.
